left.title: Flows
left.noFlowsHint: Create your first flow to get started

createDialog.title: Create New Flow
createDialog.description: Create a new flow with a custom name and description.

editDialog.title: Edit Flow
editDialog.description: Update the name and description for your flow.

right.title: Components
right.noComponents: Components will appear here when loaded

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Configure API endpoints and authentication credentials for financial data and language models. Changes are automatically saved.
apiKeys.financialDataDesc: API keys for accessing financial market data and datasets.
apiKeys.languageModelsDesc: API keys for accessing various large language model providers.
apiKeys.securityNoteDesc: API keys are stored locally in your browser and never sent to external servers. However, be cautious when sharing your browser or exporting configurations.

models.title: Models
models.description: Manage your AI models from local and cloud providers.
models.ollamaDesc: Ollama models running locally on your machine

theme.title: Theme
theme.subtitle: Customize the look and feel of your application.
theme.cardDescription: Select your preferred theme or use system setting to automatically switch between light and dark modes.

portfolioInput.name: Portfolio Input
portfolioInput.description: Enter your portfolio including tickers, shares, and prices. Connect this node to Analysts to generate insights.
portfolioInput.positionsTooltip: Add your portfolio positions with ticker, quantity, and trade price

stockInput.name: Stock Input
stockInput.description: Enter individual stocks and connect this node to Analysts to generate insights.

portfolioManager.name: Portfolio Manager
portfolioManager.description: Generates investment decisions based on input from Analysts.

output.recommendedActions: Recommended trading actions based on analyst signals
output.actionSignalNote: Note: Trading decisions (buy/sell) are based not only on analyst signals (bullish/bearish), but also consider current positions, risk management, and position rebalancing. Even if analysts are bullish, the portfolio manager may recommend selling if the stock is already held (e.g., profit-taking, position adjustment). Please check the reasoning for detailed explanations.

agents.warrenBuffett: Seeks companies with strong fundamentals and competitive advantages through value investing and long-term ownership.
agents.benGraham: Emphasizes a margin of safety and invests in undervalued companies with strong fundamentals through systematic value analysis.
agents.billAckman: Seeks to influence management and unlock value through strategic activism and contrarian investment positions.
agents.cathieWood: Focuses on disruptive innovation and growth, investing in companies that are leading technological advancements and market disruption.
agents.charlieMunger: Advocates for value investing with a focus on quality businesses and long-term growth through rational decision-making.
agents.michaelBurry: Makes contrarian bets, often shorting overvalued markets and investing in undervalued assets through deep fundamental analysis.
agents.mohnishPabrai: Focuses on value investing and long-term growth through fundamental analysis and a margin of safety.
agents.peterLynch: Invests in companies with understandable business models and strong growth potential using the 'buy what you know' strategy.
agents.philFisher: Emphasizes investing in companies with strong management and innovative products, focusing on long-term growth through scuttlebutt research.
agents.rakeshJhunjhunwala: Leverages macroeconomic insights to invest in high-growth sectors, particularly within emerging markets and domestic opportunities.
agents.stanleyDruckenmiller: Focuses on macroeconomic trends, making large bets on currencies, commodities, and interest rates through top-down analysis.
agents.aswathDamodaran: Focuses on intrinsic value and financial metrics to assess investment opportunities through rigorous valuation analysis.
agents.technicalAnalyst: Focuses on chart patterns and market trends to make investment decisions, often using technical indicators and price action analysis.
agents.fundamentalsAnalyst: Delves into financial statements and economic indicators to assess the intrinsic value of companies through fundamental analysis.
agents.growthAnalyst: Analyzes growth trends and valuation to identify growth opportunities through growth analysis.
agents.newsSentimentAnalyst: Analyzes news sentiment to predict market movements and identify opportunities through news analysis.
agents.sentimentAnalyst: Gauges market sentiment and investor behavior to predict market movements and identify opportunities through behavioral analysis.
agents.valuationAnalyst: Specializes in determining the fair value of companies, using various valuation models and financial metrics for investment decisions.
agents.duanYongping: Focuses on high-quality consumer and internet companies, emphasizing simple business models, stable cash flows, and reliable management. Prefers to hold fewer but excellent companies for the long term.
agents.zhangLei: Known as 'friend of time', emphasizes good companies + good price + long time. Prefers companies with global vision and compounding capabilities.
agents.qiuGuolu: Combines macro and industry cycle analysis, building positions during pessimism and reducing during optimism. Values valuation safety margin and risk-reward ratio.
agents.fengLiu: Builds positions gradually during extreme sentiment and market misunderstandings. Focuses on expectation gaps and intrinsic improvements, willing to endure volatility for the long term.
agents.danBin: Emphasizes being 'friends of time' with excellent companies. Prefers brand consumer, healthcare, and blue-chip leaders with long-term growth potential.

welcome.title: Deep investor agent
welcome.description: Create a flow from the left sidebar (‚åòB) to open it in a tab, or open settings (‚åò,) to configure your preferences.
welcome.terminalTitle: Welcome to Deep investor agent Terminal

progress.calculatingIntrinsicValue: Calculating intrinsic value & margin of safety

guide.title: User Guide
guide.description: Learn how to configure and use the Deep Investor Agent system

apiKeys.title: Configure API Keys
apiKeys.description: Configure API keys for financial data and language models

financialData.title: Financial Data API Keys
financialData.desc: Depending on the stock market you want to analyze, you need to configure the corresponding API keys:
financialData.financialDatasets: Financial Datasets API: For US stock market data (e.g., AAPL, MSFT, NVDA, etc.)
financialData.deepalpha: DeepAlpha API: For A-share and Hong Kong stock market data (e.g., 000001, 600000, 00700, etc.)

languageModels.title: Language Model API Keys
languageModels.desc: The system requires at least one language model API key to perform analysis:
languageModels.step1: Go to Settings and select the 'Models' tab
languageModels.step2: Select an available model (e.g., GPT-4, Claude, DeepSeek, etc.)
languageModels.step3: Configure the corresponding key in the 'API Keys' tab (e.g., OPENAI_API_KEY, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, etc.)

defaultFlow.title: Use Default Flow for Analysis
defaultFlow.description: Quick start with system preset analysis flows

step1.title: Create New Flow
step1.desc: Click the 'Create New Flow' button in the left sidebar, and the system will automatically create a flow with default nodes

step2.title: Configure Input Node
step2.desc: Click the 'Portfolio Input' or 'Stock Input' node and enter the stock ticker to analyze (e.g., AAPL, 000001, 00700, etc.)

step3.title: Run Analysis
step3.desc: Click the 'Run' button on the input node, and the system will automatically execute the analysis flow and display results in the bottom panel

customFlow.title: Customize Flow Based on Components
customFlow.description: Customize analysis flows according to your needs

step1.title: Add Start Node
step1.desc: Drag 'Portfolio Input' or 'Stock Input' node from the 'Start Nodes' group in the right sidebar to the canvas

step2.title: Add Analysis Nodes
step2.desc: Select investment master agents you need from the 'Analysts' group (e.g., Warren Buffett, Charlie Munger, Duan Yongping, etc.), or select preset analysis groups from 'Swarms' (e.g., Data Wizards, Value Investors, etc.)

step3.title: Connect Nodes
step3.desc: Connect the output of the start node to the input of analysis nodes. You can connect multiple analysis nodes for multi-dimensional analysis

step4.title: Add End Node
step4.desc: Add a 'Portfolio Manager' node from the 'End Nodes' group, connect outputs from all analysis nodes to generate final investment decisions

language.title: Switch Language Version
language.description: The system supports multiple languages for users in different regions

step1.title: Open Language Switcher
step1.desc: Click the language icon (üåê) in the top toolbar

step2.title: Select Language
step2.desc: Choose your preferred language from the dropdown: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, or English

needHelp.title: Need More Help?
needHelp.description: If you encounter any issues while using the system, please check the project README file or submit an Issue
